channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for ND
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for ND

item.title: Report X-2023111180
item.description:
Report X-2023111180

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-04T15:11:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-17
  • City: FARGO
  • State: ND
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: While picking up the drum of the floor to load to the belt package handler notice pool of liquid under the drum. Package handler immediately contacted QA. DescribePack: The crack seems to be located at the bottom corner of the drum. Crack seems to be extremely small because I could not see with my eyes. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: drum was placed in hazmat bag and put in the plastic yellow drum.
